name: Question the Sphere?
description:
Have you got the skills?

Question the sphere is a Quiz-FPS game where you have to answer questions to get bullets. Questions range from "How tall is Donald Trump to How many people stepped on the moon".

Topics:

The questions are based on topics.

  • General - General knowledge.
  • Gaming - Questions about video games.
  • Fun - Questions where you might learn a few random facts.
How do I play?

You need bullets to shoot the spheres hidden around the map, you can get bullets by answering questions correctly. Press "Q" to load a question. Don't get hit by a car otherwise you lose!

  • You win the game by shooting all the spheres around the map.
  • You lose the game when you run out of time. (Look in the bottom left corner)
  • You can also lose the game if you get hit by a car.
Controls:
  • Move - WASD
  • Jump - Space
  • Shoot - Left mouse button
  • Load question - Q
  • Pause/Settings - Escape
